ygData.subject: Re: Gnome Necros
ygData.msgSnippet: He meant in general, Dark elf necros get exp bonuses. As far as I understand it, there are class/race combinations that do give penalties to experience, for
ygData.messageBody:
He meant in general, Dark elf necros get exp bonuses.
As far as I understand it, there are class/race combinations that do give penalties to
experience, for example a dwarven paladin needs more exp than almost any other
combination of race and class to gain levels. Furthermore, supposedly there are also
certain combinations that give experience bonuses. The example that was suggested was a
dark elven necromancer. Apparently, the rumor that DE necros get an exp bonus (any and
all times exp is gained) has been confirmed by at least one GM.
This, is what I have read and heard from fellow players.


Enigma wrote:

> From: Enigma <enigma@...>
>
> Bonuses on WHAT, I know clerics get them for undead, also when fighting
> undead I seem to go up faster too. Maybe he is talking about race bonuses
> but those don't apply to Exp.
